nodes.text: Tyger Burning Bright was a club that was located in the city of Bayonard, on the planet Cularin.

The club was located near the center of Bayonard and was much more respectable than the nearby Space Monkey Café. It was only open during the hours of darkness. It had a regular program of stage performances that were interspersed with dancing. Snacks and drinks could also be purchased there.

The club was run by the Wookiee Tyger. In about 32 BBY, Selima DeWitt, a friend of Tyger, went missing. The heroes of Cularin, who had been hired to find her, traveled to the club, to speak to Tyger about her.
